name: star_removed
desc: A team member removed a star.
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A team member removed a star  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					stars:read 				 When an item is starred, the star_removed event is sent to all connected clients for users who can see the content that was starred. See the stars.list method for details of the structure of the item property.
